text: Risoku o musaboru mono wa, akuma ni toritsuka rete taoreta mono ga suru yōna oki-kata shika dekinaidearou. Sore wa kare-ra ga `shōbai wa risoku o toru yōna monoda.' To iukaradearu. Shikashi arrā wa, shōbai o yurushi, risoku (kōri) o kinjite ora reru. Sorede omo kara kunkai ga kudatta nochi, tomeru mono wa, kako no koto wa yurusa reyou. Kare no koto wa, arrā (no ote no naka) ni aru.Daga (sono hi o) kurikaesu mono wa, gōka no jūnin de, kare-ra wa eien ni sono naka ni sumu nodearu
